name: MysteryMoutain
description:
Story

you  anonymously receive message about a missing teen in a abandon town called Mystery Mountain. following up on the lead you head up to the deserted town only to experience vehicle trouble. You figure you hitch to the nearby town only to find things are not as they seem

Controls

W&S- Move forward and Backwards

A&D- Move Left and Right

Q- Pick up items and review them

How To Install  

-Download zip  

-extract files from zip

-double click on exe 

Other Games 

if you can I would greatly appreciate if you check out my other games including my current favorite killer baby
